## 1. Generate Simulated Data:

- Set seed to 1
- Create x as a sequence of numbers of 1 to 100
- Generate y as noisy sine wave

```{r}
#| echo: false
set.seed(1)
x <- 1:100
y <- sin(x / 10) + rnorm(100, sd = 0.2)
```
